name: Electric Black Mamba
description: Electric Black Mamba is an indica-dominant strain bred from a Black Domina mother and a Purple Diesel male. This 70% indica is perfect for those treating chronic pain or insomnia, and its high concentration of the terpene myrcene provides you with a “couch-lock” effect. Its dark forest green buds carry a sweet blackberry aroma with notes of skunky hash. Not for the novice grower, this plant demands constant attention and does not like to be overfed.
descriptionPlain: Electric Black Mamba is an indica-dominant strain bred from a Black Domina mother and a Purple Diesel male. This 70% indica is perfect for those treating chronic pain or insomnia, and its high concentration of the terpene myrcene provides you with a “couch-lock” effect. Its dark forest green buds carry a sweet blackberry aroma with notes of skunky hash. Not for the novice grower, this plant demands constant attention and does not like to be overfed.

highlightedReviews.text: Super for pain! relaxation and insomnia.Heavy med both physically and heavy/relaxing mentally.A1

This has been one of my favorite strains. I am totally in love with how it mellows me out and manages my pain. 

I don't feel too heavy on it though which is especially nice given the amount of relief it provides.

I will definitely be getting some more the next time it is available.
